channel.title: {PI}Donor Pins, Auth Codes, Vote4Cash
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I was wondering on how I can add these things into my server, and work.
[u][b]Donator Pins[/b][/u] I want to make it to where whenever a Person Donates, They get a Code, (A completely Random code full of letters and numbers) and then they have to go to the forums and Redeem the code to get there Donator Status & Item?
[u][b]Authorization Codes[/b][/u] I want to make it to where whenever someone types ::vote, it takes them to a webpage with my Voting Sites, then once they're done voting, they can click on SUBMIT, which will give them an ::auth (s4js8gs) or something, then when typed ingame, they recieve 25M cash and 15 PK Points?
[u][b]Vote4Cash[/b][/u] This basically fits into Auth Codes, I already have this basically but it doesn't work, whenever a player types ::vote, then they vote on the page, and type ::claim ingame, it keeps saying "You have already voted" ? This message gets alerted to everyone including myself...
Any help if appreciated, Thank you.

item.title: {PI}Donor Pins, Auth Codes, Vote4Cash
item.dc:creator: @fallenlegend fallenlegend
item.description:
@fallenlegend wrote:

Hi guys,

I was wondering on how I can add these things into my server, and work.

Donator Pins
I want to make it to where whenever a Person Donates, They get a Code, (A completely Random code full of letters and numbers) and then they have to go to the forums and Redeem the code to get there Donator Status & Item?

Authorization Codes
I want to make it to where whenever someone types ::vote, it takes them to a webpage with my Voting Sites, then once they’re done voting, they can click on SUBMIT, which will give them an ::auth (s4js8gs) or something, then when typed ingame, they recieve 25M cash and 15 PK Points?

Vote4Cash
This basically fits into Auth Codes, I already have this basically but it doesn’t work, whenever a player types ::vote, then they vote on the page, and type ::claim ingame, it keeps saying “You have already voted” ? This message gets alerted to everyone including myself…

Any help if appreciated, Thank you.
